imdb.plot outline: Hosted by talk show host, Chris Hardwick, this 30 minute segment provides information about the Internet while being scrutinized by amazing comedians. This show consists of clips, gifs, pictures, and etc. that thrive within the dark shadows of what is known as the Internet.
